about_the_game:
Enhance your aim training aesthetic with KovaaK's first cosmetic DLC, the Anime Pack. While maintaining the high-quality aim training KovaaK's is renowned for, this pack allows you to personalize your experience with anime inspired visuals, including character skins, skies, props, and more!

Support & Customize

Choosing the Anime Pack not only allows you to personalize your training environment but also supports the KovaaK's development team. Your contribution helps us continue to refine and expand, ensuring that the KovaaK's community enjoys ongoing improvements and new features.

DLC FEATURES

  • 1 Steam Avatar: Show your love for anime and KovaaK's.
  • 4 Anime Character Skins: Bring a unique anime flair to your character's appearance.
  • 9 Skies: Customize the atmosphere of your training space with a variety of skies.
  • 1 Weapon Skin
  • 6 Textures/Materials
  • 34 Map Creator Props: Deck out your aiming space with a wide selection of anime-themed props to create a visually engaging shooting gallery.
  • 4 Bamboos
  • 3 Barrels
  • 6 Planks
  • 3 Statues
  • 3 Paper Lamps
  • 1 Bell
  • 1 Bridge
  • 1 Gate
  • 1 Cart
  • 1 Door
  • 9-piece Modular Wall Kit
  • 2 Trees

This pack is all about bringing fun and a sense of individuality to your training sessions, allowing you to enjoy the proven aim training methodology of KovaaK's with an added visual appeal. We're grateful for your support and excited to see the community's creativity come to life with this new addition.

Community and Creator Empowerment

We believe in empowering and rewarding our creators and community. To that end, scenarios and maps created using DLC content are accessible to all users, regardless of whether they have purchased the corresponding DLC. This approach ensures that everyone in the KovaaK's community can experience the creativity and innovation of user-generated content!

name: KovaaK's Anime Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit (latest Service Pack)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or AMD Phenom X3 865
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 460, ATI Radeon HD 4850, or Intel HD Graphics 4400
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 232 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit (latest Service Pack)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 or AMD Phenom™ II X3 or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 660 or AMD Radeon™ HD 7950 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 232 MB available space

short_description: Enhance your aim training aesthetic with KovaaK's first cosmetic DLC, the Anime Pack. Personalize your experience with anime-inspired visuals while supporting the development team. Includes character skins, skies, props, and more, playable by all users, promoting community creativity.
